c74object.name: mcs.nn~
c74object.digest: Multi-channel interface for deep learning models (batch version)
c74object.description: Multi-channel interface for deep learning models (batch version)

objarg.name: model path
objarg.digest: Absolute path to the pretrained model
objarg.description: Absolute path to the pretrained model.

objarg.name: method
objarg.digest: Name of the method to call during synthesis
objarg.description: Name of the method to call during synthesis.

objarg.name: buffer size
objarg.digest: Size of the internal buffer (can't be lower than the method's ratio)
objarg.description: Size of the internal buffer (can't be lower than the method's ratio).

method.name: get_weights
method.digest: Retrieve the weights of a layer
method.description: Retrieve the weights of a layer

method.name: mode
method.digest: Mode de downsampling pour les paramètre du modèle: 0=linéaire, 1=log, 2=cosine
method.description: Mode de downsampling pour les paramètre du modèle: 0=linéaire, 1=log, 2=cosine

attribute.name: gpu
attribute.digest: Enable / disable gpu usage when available
attribute.description: Enable / disable gpu usage when available
